examples.example: 他总是微笑面对生活，从不轻易生气。

translate.english: He always faces life with a smile and never gets angry easily.

examples.example: 我们应该保持平和的心态，不要轻易生气，这样生活才会更加美好。

translate.english: We should keep a peaceful mind and not get angry easily, so that life will be more beautiful.

examples.example: 每当我感到疲惫时，看看窗外的美景就不会再生气，心情也会变得格外舒畅。

translate.english: Whenever I feel tired, looking at the beautiful scenery outside the window will no longer make me angry, and my mood will also become extremely comfortable.
